result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua G. Piper

defendant.name: Piper, Joshua G.
defendant.address: W9576 County Road F, Antigo, WI 54409

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Joshua G. Piper in court with attorney Jay Kronenwetter.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called 15CM236 and 15CM44.  15CM44 is assigned to Judge Habeck, however agreement for Judge Rhode to resolve.  No objection by Judge Habeck or by State and defense.  Agreement stated on record.  Plea to ct 1 & 23 in 15CM236.  Ct 2 and 15CM44 to be dismissed.   Plea advisement form filed and reviewed.  Ct 1 - Possession of THC - Guilty plea.  Ct 3 Bail Jumping - Guilty plea.  Ct 2 dismissed and read-in.  15CM44 Dismissed and read in consistent with plea agreement.  Constitutional rights reviewed, elements of charges and right to jury trial reviewed.  Penalties reviewed. Court finds def understands charges, penalties and rights.  Factual basis for pleas.  Pleas accepted, found guilty of Ct 1 & Ct 3 in 15CM236.  15CM44 has $100.00 bond.  Request that this bond be applied to fine &cost in 15CM236.  State recommends  on Ct 1  - 10 days jail plus $100.00 fine and cost.  Ct 3 60 days jail consecutive to ct 1.  Request expungment after 1 year, if no crimes.  Response by Atty Kronenwetter for sentencing.  Statement by def.  Court  Ct 1 10 days jail $100 fine plus cost and DNA surcharge and sample.  No jail credit.  Ct 3 - 30 days jail , concurrent with ct 1.   Huber privileges.  Jail  to commence on or before 3-15-16.  Cost ordered plus DNA surcharge.   Court will apply bonds to fine & costs.  Court reserves right for expungment under 973.015  after 1 yr., no crimes to probable cause.  Balance of bond to def.  Post conviction rights.    15FO147 and 15TR247 set for plea and sentencing 4-1416 at 8:30 pm  Review hearing scheduled for January 31, 2017 at 01:00 pm.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved
